attributes.action: No Naming and Shaming of Foreign Workers, Children or Customers
attributes.additional_details: Divisive, right wing politics have no place in the 21st Century, let alone Britain http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-37561035
attributes.background:
Theresa May and Amber Rudd are proposing a systematic, bureaucratic, state-sponsored persecution of people of different nationalities through asking businesses, landlords, schools and universities to name and shame foreign staff and students. 
This is fundementally wrong and must be stopped.

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. Companies, schools and universities are not being asked to "name and shame" foreign staff and students.
